${ModID}:DiveForCover.NAME: Dive for Cover
${ModID}:DiveForCover.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Remove !M! of your debuffs.

${ModID}:ExtremeSpeed.NAME: Extreme Speed
${ModID}:ExtremeSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Draw X cards. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:ExtremeSpeed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw X+1 cards. NL They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GoForTheHeart.NAME: Go for the Heart
${ModID}:GoForTheHeart.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, apply !M! kunoichi:Bleeding.

${ModID}:HiddenSupplies.NAME: Hidden Supplies
${ModID}:HiddenSupplies.DESCRIPTION: stslib:Grave. NL Gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.{@@}

${ModID}:PowerupPunch.NAME: Powerup Punch
${ModID}:PowerupPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.

${ModID}:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
${ModID}:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL kunoichi:Counter: Deal !M! damage back.

${ModID}:RisingEdge.NAME: Rising Edge
${ModID}:RisingEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL kunoichi:Opener: {!M!|1=It costs 0 this turn|@=They cost 0 this turn}.{@@}

${ModID}:Snipe.NAME: Snipe
${ModID}:Snipe.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card to deal !D! damage and apply kunoichi:Bleeding equal to its cost + !M!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need another card to fire.

${ModID}:UnseenStrike.NAME: Unseen Strike
${ModID}:UnseenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy does not intend to attack, deal !D! damage again.
